other_tests.findings: Retinal hemorrhages were present in all children: multiple large flame-shaped, dot blot, and preretinal hemorrhages in one, vitreous and retinal hemorrhages in another, and scattered intraretinal hemorrhages in the third.
Demonstrated subdural hematoma in all patients; in one patient, a simple parietal skull fracture was noted.
Abnormalities consistent with OI in the first patient; showed generalized osteopenia and previous fractures in the second patient; and was normal in the third patient.
